languages.text: "Полагаю, это чей-то дар, а не работа на заказ. Учитывая, как часто владыка бывает в отлучках и как часто тут заправляют в {mf|его|ее} отсутствие, не удивлюсь, если появление этой картины на стене станет для {mf|него|нее} сюрпризом..."

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Как нам повезло что мы можем лицезреть такую красоту каждый день

languages.text: "I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, это чей-то дар, а не работа на заказ. Учитывая, как часто владыка бывает в отлучках и как часто тут заправляют в {mf|его|ее} отсутствие, не удивлюсь, если появление этой картины на стене станет для {mf|него|нее} сюрпризом..."

traits.locale_text: "I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

"I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

"I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

languages.text: “我猜这应该是件礼物，不是委托的作品。考虑到大人经常外出，这个地方经常在{mf|他|她}不在的情况下运转，如果{mf|他|她}本人看到墙上这幅画也感到惊喜的话，我并不会感到过于惊讶……”
languages.original_text: "I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

traits.locale_text: “我猜这应该是件礼物，不是委托的作品。考虑到大人经常外出，这个地方经常在{mf|他|她}不在的情况下运转，如果{mf|他|她}本人看到墙上这幅画也感到惊喜的话，我并不会感到过于惊讶……”

languages.text: «Creo que es un regalo y no algo que haya encargado. Dada la frecuencia de las ausencias de nuestr{mf|o|a} soberan{mf|o|a} y la gestión del lugar durante las mismas, no me sorprendería que la presencia de este cuadro le resulte tan inesperada como a nosotros...».
languages.original_text: "I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que es un regalo y no algo que haya encargado. Dada la frecuencia de las ausencias de nuestr{mf|o|a} soberan{mf|o|a} y la gestión del lugar durante las mismas, no me sorprendería que la presencia de este cuadro le resulte tan inesperada como a nosotros...».

languages.text: 「これは依頼して出来た作品じゃなくて、贈り物だったんじゃないだろうか。主人の頻繁な外出頻度、そして{mf|彼|彼女}の不在中の管理体勢を考えると、壁にこの絵があるのを見て{mf|彼|彼女}が驚いたとしても不思議じゃない…」
languages.original_text: "I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

traits.locale_text: 「これは依頼して出来た作品じゃなくて、贈り物だったんじゃないだろうか。主人の頻繁な外出頻度、そして{mf|彼|彼女}の不在中の管理体勢を考えると、壁にこの絵があるのを見て{mf|彼|彼女}が驚いたとしても不思議じゃない…」

languages.text: "Ich denke, das war ein Geschenk, keine Auftragsarbeit. Wenn man bedenkt, wie oft {mf|der Souverän|die Souveränin} unterwegs ist, und wie dieser Ort in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Abwesenheit gepflegt wird, würde es mich nicht wundern, wenn der Anblick dieses Gemäldes an der Wand auch für {mf|ihn|sie} eine Überraschung wäre ..."
languages.original_text: "I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, das war ein Geschenk, keine Auftragsarbeit. Wenn man bedenkt, wie oft {mf|der Souverän|die Souveränin} unterwegs ist, und wie dieser Ort in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Abwesenheit gepflegt wird, würde es mich nicht wundern, wenn der Anblick dieses Gemäldes an der Wand auch für {mf|ihn|sie} eine Überraschung wäre ..."

languages.text: « J'imagine qu'il s'agissait d'un cadeau, et non d'une commande. Au vu de la fréquence des absences {mf|du souverain|de la souveraine} et de la manière dont ce lieu est géré en son absence, je parie que la vue de cette peinture au mur est aussi une surprise à ses yeux... »
languages.original_text: "I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine qu'il s'agissait d'un cadeau, et non d'une commande. Au vu de la fréquence des absences {mf|du souverain|de la souveraine} et de la manière dont ce lieu est géré en son absence, je parie que la vue de cette peinture au mur est aussi une surprise à ses yeux... »

languages.text: "Bunun ısmarlama değil de bir hediye olduğunu tahmin ediyorum. Hükümdarın genelde seyahatte olduğu ve buranın onsuz idare edildiğini düşününce duvarda böyle bir tablo gördüğüne şaşırsa bu hiç sürpriz olmaz."
languages.original_text: "I imagine this was a gift, not a commissioned piece. Considering how often the sovereign is away and how much this place is managed in {mf|his|her} absence, I wouldn't be surprised if the sight of this painting on the wall is a surprise for {mf|him|her} as well..."

traits.locale_text: "Bunun ısmarlama değil de bir hediye olduğunu tahmin ediyorum. Hükümdarın genelde seyahatte olduğu ve buranın onsuz idare edildiğini düşününce duvarda böyle bir tablo gördüğüne şaşırsa bu hiç sürpriz olmaz."
